Hey there, I'm Carolineee!

I like front end software development, creative projects, & being outside

I'm working as a full stack developer in Honolulu, Hawaii. My work focuses on front end design and development, using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and AngularJS. I spend my free time whipping up baked goods and trying my hand at all kinds of art projects.
